title: [K-12] Personalized Language Learning Program Utilizing Intelligent E-Learning Systems

context.prior_knowledge: Fundamental digital device usage skills and elementary-level language comprehension
context.additional_context: An adaptive learning program for adult learners over 40, applying adaptive algorithms to self-directed language skill development in mobile environments

learning_goals: Learners can complete over 80% of personalized language content tailored to their individual proficiency levels via adaptive learning algorithms.
Learners can improve weekly learning goal achievement rates by over 75% using system-provided feedback.
Learners can submit outcomes demonstrating the application of acquired language skills to real-life contexts through project-based assessments.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
